TabSnip is the ultimate screenshot tool for your browser. Capture your current tab in a single click or drag to select an area, then modify your screenshot directly within the extension — no redirects, no delays!

With intuitive editing tools, you can:

- Add padding for polished screenshots.
- Scribble to highlight key areas.
- Crop to focus on what matters.
- Choose static or ambient backgrounds for a professional touch.

Key Features✨:

- Quick and easy screenshot capture.
- Fully integrated editing tools — no need to leave the extension.
- Option to create watermark-free images with our Premium upgrade.
- TabSnip is designed to save you time and let your creativity shine. Download or copy your screenshots in seconds!

Start snipping smarter today with TabSnip!
